titles.title: Community Based Independence for Seniors Act
Community Based Independence for Seniors Act
A bill to establish a Community-Based Institutional Special Needs Plan demonstration program to target home and community-based care to eligible Medicare beneficiaries.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

calendar.text: Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Reported by Senator Hatch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 114-103.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 182.

bill.summary:
3/11/2015--Introduced. Community Based Independence for Seniors Act
The Secretary of Health and Human Services shall establish a Community-Based Institutional Special Needs Plan demonstration program to target home and community-based care to eligible Medicare beneficiaries age 65 or older.
